member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_FRAME_ARGUMENT
member.summary: Represents the decode parameters for a frame. Parameter definitions are specified by the codec specification for each decode profile.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_FRAME_ARGUMENT.Type
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the type of argument.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_FRAME_ARGUMENT.Size
member.summary: The size of the data in pArgument, in bytes.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_FRAME_ARGUMENT.pData
member.summary: A pointer to the argument data.
